answers.answer: Numbness and tingling are early symptoms of MS. A friend had numbness and weakness in both arms and it was extreme hypertension. Good luck.

Hi,How are you? Are there other symptoms present? Numbness may also be caused by musculoskeletal or neurological causes. A history of muscle strain or lifting heavy weights or nerve compression may be the cukprit. However, for proper evaluation, have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation. Direct clinical examiantion is important. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: Numbness in fingers and toes?? I am an exercise instructor and a runner. I eat mainly healthy execept for chocolate treats. I am a low body weight and diabetes does not run in my family. What is it?
title: curious..
